if_someone_mentions_me:
User kripya dhyaan de, mujhe upyog krne ka treeka kuchh iss prakar hai : 
!slack general Namaste mitron!

Hola! 
I'm a cross platform messaging bot.
Through me you can send message from Discord to Slack.
Kitna tag krte rhte ho yrr!
Hi peeps, I'm a cross platform messaging bot.

slack:
Sends the message to slack
 Usage: !slack channel_name msg
eg: !slack general Predicting future isn't magic its Data Science
